context: Luxury hotel chain responding to post-pandemic guest expectations for touchless experiences

request.purpose: Deploy comprehensive contactless guest services platform
request.justification: Competitor analysis shows 40% of guests prefer contactless options, current system outdated

decision_process.outcome: Clear requirements defined for mobile app and kiosk integration

business_impact.expected_outcome: Increase guest satisfaction by 25%, reduce check-in time by 50%, improve operational efficiency
business_impact.projected_value: $1.8M in additional revenue from higher occupancy and rates

lessons_learned: Guest feedback critical for feature prioritization, phased implementation reduces risk, comprehensive training essential for staff buy-in
